article_title: Sen. Ted Cruz Compares Conservative #DefundObamacare Skeptics to Nazi Appeasers Because Why Not?
article_text:
During Tuesday's anti-Obamacare "fauxlibuster," Sen. Ted Cruz (R-Texas) whipped out an analogy:

There are key differences between the Affordable Care Act and Hitler. But, you know, whatever.

Update: On Wednesday morning, the Anti-Defamation League weighed in. "I wish Senator Cruz would have used another comparison, but his statement does not trivialize the Holocaust," Abraham Foxman, national director of the ADL, said in a statement sent to Mother Jones.

og.description: Affordable health care has yet to annex parts of Czechoslovakia.
og.title: Sen. Ted Cruz compares #DefundObamacare skeptics to Nazi appeasers because why not?

But, you know, whatever.
